title: Ahihud
html: AHIHUD(A·hiʹhud).Despite differences in Hebrew spelling and vowel pointing, the names of the two different individuals below are spelled the same in English.1. [ʼAchi·hudhʹ, possibly, “Brother Is Dignity”]. Son of Shelomi; as chieftain of the tribe of Asher, he was chosen to assist in dividing the Promised Land among the people.—Nu 34:18, 27, 29.2. [ʼAchi·chudhʹ]. Brother of Uzza, of the tribe of Benjamin.—1Ch 8:7.
